title: Ticket #615: condor_config_val manual page needs correction
description: The condor_config_val man page definitely does not match what the code does. Which options work with which other options needs improvement. The relationship to security and authorization also needs to be explained.
remarks:
The manual page has been updated, and improved as asked for in #640, but is currently stalled, awaiting code overhaul. Then the manual page can be rewritten to correctly reflect the code.

2011-Dec-01 11:43:39 by smoler:
Neglected ticket from 2009. Pete's leaving, so reassigning to Todd, so he can figure out who inherits this ticket.
